form.label: Suricata Alert Overview (V5.2)
form.description: V5 Additions: Dashboard Now Integrates Drilldown

search.query:
| tstats summariesonly=f count from datamodel=Suricata_Suite.alerts by alerts.severity, alerts.signature, alerts.category, alerts.src_ip, alerts.src_port, alerts.dest_ip, alerts.dest_port, alerts.proto, alerts.sid | rename alerts.severity AS severity, alerts.signature AS signature, alerts.category AS category, alerts.src_ip AS src_ip, alerts.src_port AS src_port, alerts.dest_ip AS dest_ip, alerts.dest_port AS dest_port, alerts.proto AS proto, alerts.sid AS SID | stats count by severity, signature, category, src_ip, src_port, dest_ip, dest_port, proto, SID
```Filter Out Specific Alerts Here``` | where !like (signature, "ET DNS Query for .cc TLD") AND !like (dest_ip,"1.1.1.1")

done.set:
| eval ExternalSouce = case( cidrmatch("10.0.0.0/8",src_ip),"False", cidrmatch("172.16.0.0/12",src_ip),"False", cidrmatch("192.168.0.0/16",src_ip),"False", isnull(src_ip) OR like(src_ip,""), "False", match(src_ip,"^((25[0-5]|(2[0-4]|1\d|[1-9]|)\d)\.?\b){4}$"),"True")
| eval ExternalDest = case( cidrmatch("10.0.0.0/8",dest_ip),"False", cidrmatch("172.16.0.0/12",dest_ip),"False", cidrmatch("192.168.0.0/16",dest_ip),"False", isnull(src_ip) OR like(dest_ip,""), "False", match(src_ip,"^((25[0-5]|(2[0-4]|1\d|[1-9]|)\d)\.?\b){4}$"),"True")

| eval severity = upper(substr(severity,1,1)).lower(substr(severity,2)) | eval sorter=severity | eval sorter=case(severity="High",1,severity="Medium",2,severity="Low",3) | sort by sorter,-count | fields - sorter

| appendpipe [| stats count | where count=0 | eval "severity"="No Instances Found"] | rename severity AS Severity, count AS Count, signature AS Signature, category AS Category, src_ip AS Source, dest_ip AS Destination, src_port AS "Source Port", dest_port AS "Destination Port", proto AS Protocol

| eval src_port=tonumber(src_port) | eval dest_port=tonumber(dest_port) | appendpipe [where src_port > 1024 | eval src_port = "High Port"] | appendpipe [where dest_port > 1024 | eval dest_port = "High Port"] | mvexpand src_port | mvexpand dest_port | where (src_port < tonumber(1025) OR src_port = "High Port") AND (dest_port < tonumber(1025) OR dest_port = "High Port")

search.query: | stats count by severity, signature | stats count by severity $HighToLow$ $Formating$
| stats count by severity, signature, category, SID $HighToLow$ $Formating$

$HighPort$ | stats count by severity, signature, category, SID, src_ip, src_port, dest_ip, dest_port, proto | where like (signature, "$signature$") OR like (SID, "$signature$") $HighToLow$ $Formating$
$HighPort$ | where like (src_ip, "$ip$") OR like (dest_ip, "$ip$") | stats count by severity, signature, category, SID, src_ip, src_port, dest_ip, dest_port, proto $HighToLow$ $Formating$
$IPEval$ | where like (ExternalSouce, "True") AND !like (ExternalDest, "True") | fields severity, SID, src_ip, dest_ip, count $HighToLow$ $Formating$
$IPEval$ | where !like (ExternalSouce, "True") AND like (ExternalDest, "True") | fields severity, SID, src_ip, dest_ip, count $HighToLow$ $Formating$
